entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text: @realDonaldTrump @FoxNews @OANN Call me crazy, but with all this freed up time from your usual weekend golf junkets, you could spend an afternoon developing a national strategy around testing & tracing...maybe? #COVID19 #ContactTracing #CoronavirusPandemic #coronavirustesting
